thread.title: CNN Reporter Has Quite Possibly the BEST Reaction to ‘Self-Righteous, Smug’ Oscars Lectures…
thread.title_full: CNN Reporter Has Quite Possibly the BEST Reaction to ‘Self-Righteous, Smug’ Oscars Lectures…

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: CNN Reporter Has Quite Possibly the BEST Reaction to ‘Self-Righteous, Smug’ Oscars Lectures…
text:
If you didn’t watch the Oscars last night you didn’t really miss much. 
It was pretty much your typical awards show where Hollywood liberals lectured the rest of the world about politics. 
It is becoming pretty clear that you should just ignore awards shows if you don’t want to be talked down to by Hollywood elites.   
However, something interesting did come from the Oscars.   
Check out what this CNN political reporter had to say about it…  1'); }); 
CNN senior political reporter Nia-Malika Henderson tore into “self-righteous, smug liberals” in Hollywood Monday for their “lectures” during Sunday’s 89th Academy Awards, accusing them of being “hypocritical” when it comes to the issue of diversity. 
Here’s the video…
